items.title: Pfizer's RSV shot wins EMA nod
items.summary: The European Medicines Agency recommended approving Pfizer's RSV vaccine for adults 60+, paving the way for a commercial launch across the bloc.

items.title: Moderna posts Phase III melanoma win with Keytruda combo
items.summary: Moderna and Merck reported a 35% reduction in recurrence for their mRNA vaccine + Keytruda regimen, and plan FDA submission later this year.

items.title: AstraZeneca, EQRx terminate $1B licensing deal
items.summary: AstraZeneca and EQRx mutually ended their asset licensing pact as pricing reforms reshape the US market; both parties will explore new collaborations.

items.title: FDA approves Eli Lilly's oral obesity drug Orizea
items.summary: CDER granted priority approval to Orizea for chronic weight management, making Lilly the first oral entrant against GLP-1 incumbents.

items.title: Phase II study shows Takeda's oral Crohn's therapy meets endpoints
items.summary: Takeda disclosed top-line Phase II data showing its oral TYK2 inhibitor achieved clinical remission at week 12, setting up a Phase III start in H2.
